name: MS Graph for SharePoint
description: This app connects to SharePoint using the MS Graph API to support investigate and generic actions

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Using SharePoint Site ID app config value, and given source_drive_id, copy source_item_id into a folder identified with dest values

source_item_id.description: ID for drive item that needs to be copied

dest_drive_id.description: Drive ID that contains target folder to copy item to

dest_folder_id.description: ID of target folder to copy drive item to

file_name.description: Optional new file name for the copy. If not provided will use original

actions.description: Create new Drive item Folder using SharePoint site in asset config and provided Parent Item ID
List the items in a drive folder by drive ID or search for a specific file name if provided
Fetch the details of the SharePoint sites
actions.verbose: The 'limit' parameter controls the number of records to return. Leave the parameter value blank in order to fetch all the records.

limit.description: Maximum number of sites to return

actions.description: Fetch the available lists under a SharePoint site
actions.verbose: The 'limit' parameter controls the number of records to return. Leave the parameter value blank in order to fetch all the records.

limit.description: Maximum number of sites to return

actions.description: Retrieves a list from a SharePoint Site
actions.verbose: The 'limit' parameter controls the number of records to return. Leave the parameter value blank in order to fetch all the records.

list.description: Title or ID of the list to retrieve

limit.description: Maximum number of list items to return

actions.description: Add an item to a list on a SharePoint Site

list.description: Title or ID of the list to add an item

actions.description: Update an item in a list on a SharePoint Site

list.description: Title or ID of the list to which the item belongs

item_id.description: ID of the item to update

actions.description: Retrieves a file from a SharePoint site
actions.verbose: The 'file path' parameter will be considered from the Shared Document library in the configured Site. If the file is available under the Shared Document library itself, then provide only the '/' value in the 'file path' parameter.

actions.description: Removes a file from a SharePoint site
actions.verbose: The 'file path' parameter will be considered from the Shared Document library in the configured Site. If the file is available under the Shared Document library itself, then provide only the '/' value in the 'file path' parameter.
